channel.title: Making party room chest
channel.description:
I have made a room where players can have drop parties but theres something i need added
- Drop party Chest - Items able to be added in chest and dropped when lever pulled - Lever needed - balloons drop when lever pulled so player can pop and items come out
if anyone can give me link to a snippet or tell me how to add it in that would be great plz and ty

item.title: Making party room chest
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Things you need to do:

[ul][li] Add the chest object[/li]
[li] Have chest display the UI on click[/li]
[li] Handle the UI packets[/li]
[li] Add lever[/li]
[li] Once lever is pulled have balloons spawn on ground. Once clicked on replace them with a random item from the chest[/li][/ul]

Good luck!

Read full topic
